title: collinscoinz
author: collinscoinz
content: For real i think if we put in this idear it will work for this country i have an idear that if i become the president of nigeria for one day,this is what i will do.first of all will make sure all the states handles or controls their resurceses and report back to the federal,and by so doing also they should take care of the issuse of unemployment in their region,to see if they can solve that for themselfs.

comments.author: cytpoway121
comments.body: Quote from: collinscoinz on January 28, 2023, 07:31:34 AMFor real i think if we put in this idear it will work for this country i have an idear that if i become the president of nigeria for one day,this is what i will do.first of all will make sure all the states handles or controls their resurceses and report back to the federal,and by so doing also they should take care of the issuse of unemployment in their region,to see if they can solve that for themselfs.The main issue weh de be say as a president, you cannot wake up and choose this decision and implement it; you need to inform the senate, the house of reps, the state government arms of government and then reach a logical way to resolve this and decentralized the economy of the nation. Infact, the idea is the first step to proper restructuring of the country that we all clamor for. Meanwhile, if we get a leader like sai baba, with the intentions to restructure the nation; it can also be done by making the arms of government follow the executive orders just as sai baba as done over the last 7 years. Also, unemployment is not just about control of resources; the nation needs to implement policies that help people grow.How?Revoke the high import taxRevoke the border closure lawRevoke the excessive income and utility taxManager Monetary policies well and stop meffy from printing naira every time he is hornyThere are lots more, make God help man survive this clueless contri

Doing something like that have to pass many protocols and has to be agreed by the National Assembly always. As the president, you can only bring forth projects but the National Assembly members have the final say either to accept or reject it.
